harvesting.name: harvesting
harvesting.title: Harvesting Resources
harvesting.start_text:
Welcome, do you want to make some money? 
Paradise needs a constant supply of Energy to keep our living standards up. I would get it myself, but I'm too busy enjoying the beach weather. 
Harvest some energy, then sell it at Paradise. I'll even give you a bonus!

outcomes.name: success
objectives_text: Return to Successful Businessman at Paradise.
outcomes.end_text: Well done. Here's some extra cash for your effort.

trading.name: trading
trading.title: Trading
trading.start_text: Trade between Paradise and Forge until you've sold 20 food/water to Forge and 10 metals to Paradise.

outcomes.name: success
objectives_text: Return to Successful Businessman at Paradise.
outcomes.end_text: Well done once more. Here's your money.
